description.raw:
* Added unitint, unitfloat, and unitstr to auxiliary.py to store unit information
    along side primitive values.

    Altered xml.XML._handle_param to use these unit-storing primitives. Reads unit
    information.

    Updated unit tests for mzml and mzid to check that unit_info fields are populated.

* Added parser for the "duration" xsd type that returns a unitfloat("minute").
    Updated mzxml schema to use this new converter for "retentionTime". Corrected
    the converter for precursorMz@precursorCharge attribute definition in mzxml schema
    too.

* Updated test_mzxml to check that "retentionTime" properly converts units
    using the new duration parser. Updated data.mzxml_spectra's retentionTime
    fields to use minutes instead of seconds.

* Added handling of BOM in ByteCountingXMLScanner
description.html:
• Added unitint, unitfloat, and unitstr to auxiliary.py to store unit information along side primitive values.

    Altered xml.XML._handle_param to use these unit-storing primitives. Reads unit information.

    Updated unit tests for mzml and mzid to check that unit_info fields are populated.

  • Added parser for the "duration" xsd type that returns a unitfloat("minute"). Updated mzxml schema to use this new converter for "retentionTime". Corrected the converter for precursorMz@precursorCharge attribute definition in mzxml schema too.

  • Updated test_mzxml to check that "retentionTime" properly converts units using the new duration parser. Updated data.mzxml_spectra's retentionTime fields to use minutes instead of seconds.

  • Added handling of BOM in ByteCountingXMLScanner

title.raw: Implementation of described work in " cvParam Unit Awareness"
title.html: Implementation of described work in " cvParam Unit Awareness"
